text:
Boris Vladimirovich Klyuyev (; 13 July 1944 — 1 September 2020) was a Soviet and Russian actor and teacher. He was named a People's Artist of Russia in 2002. He was born in Moscow. Klyuyev "D'Artagnan and Three Musketeers", "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson" and "TASS Is Authorized to Declare...".
Klyuyev died on 1 September 2020 in Moscow from lung cancer, aged 76.

annotations.surface_form: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson
